mdx.excerpt: Create an interactive 3D web application using Gatsby, three.js, and react-three-fiber.

frontmatter.title: Create an Interactive 3D Web Application
frontmatter.description: I show the basic steps of how to get started using react-three-fiber, which is a library that links React and three.js. With these skills you can create interactive 3D web applications.

frontmatter.title: Creating My Website Using Gatsby: Part 2 - Comments
